DestinationDetails.Activities: Snorkeling and scuba diving in coral reefs  Glass-bottom boat trips  Desert safari (quad biking & camel rides)  Boat cruises to Tiran Island  Parasailing and water sports  Shopping and dining at Naama Bay  Nightlife and entertainment shows
DestinationDetails.Attractions: Ras Mohammed National Park  Naama Bay  SOHO Square  Sharks Bay  Tiran Island  Old Market (Sharm El Maya)  Farsha Café (cliffside views)
DestinationDetails.BestTimeToVisit: March–May & September–November: Perfect balance for beaches and diving
DestinationDetails.Includes: Airport pick-up and drop-off  Accommodation in a 4★ or 5★ seaside resort  Daily breakfast (all-inclusive option available)  Guided city tour of Sharm El Sheikh  Snorkeling or diving trip in the Red Sea  Visit to Ras Mohammed National Park  Boat trip to Tiran Island  Desert safari experience (quad bike & camel ride)  Transportation for all scheduled tours  Professional tour guide  All taxes and service charges included
DestinationDetails.description: Sharm El Sheikh is a famous tourist city known for its world-class resorts, stunning beaches, and exceptional diving spots. Located on the Red Sea, it offers crystal-clear waters, colorful coral reefs, and rich marine life, making it a top destination for snorkeling and scuba diving enthusiasts.  The city combines natural beauty with modern amenities, featuring luxury hotels, vibrant nightlife, and relaxing seaside experiences. Popular areas such as Naama Bay and Ras Mohammed National Park attract visitors from around the world.  Sharm El Sheikh is an ideal destination for leisure, adventure, and relaxation, offering a perfect blend of sun, sea, and unforgettable Red Sea experiences.
DestinationDetails.name: sharm El sheikh
DestinationDetails.shortDescription: A famous tourist city known for resorts, beaches, and diving spots.
